an4.186:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4.186:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an4.186:4.4: “kena nu kho, bhante, loko nīyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasaṃ gacchatī”ti?
an4.186:5.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṃ paṭibhānaṃ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:5.4: ‘kena nu kho, bhante, loko nīyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasaṃ gacchatī’”ti?
an4.186:5.6: “Cittena kho, bhikkhu, loko nīyati, cittena parikassati, cittassa uppannassa vasaṃ gacchatī”ti.
an4.186:6.1: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṃ uttari pañhaṃ apucchi:
an4.186:6.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bahussuto dhammadharo hotī”ti?
an4.186:7.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu ummaggo, bhaddakaṃ paṭibhānaṃ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:7.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bahussuto dhammadharo hotī’”ti?
an4.186:7.7: “Bahū kho, bhikkhu, mayā dhammā desitā—
an4.186:7.8: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthā, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.186:7.9: Catuppadāya cepi, bhikkhu, gāthāya atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti bahussuto dhammadharoti alaṃvacanāyā”ti.
an4.186:8.1: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṃ uttari pañhaṃ apucchi:
an4.186:8.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī”ti?
an4.186:9.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṃ paṭibhānaṃ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:9.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī’”ti?
an4.186:9.7: “Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhuno ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti sutaṃ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṃ ativijjha passati;
an4.186:9.8: ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti sutaṃ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṃ ativijjha passati;
an4.186:9.9: ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti sutaṃ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṃ ativijjha passati;
an4.186:9.10: ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti sutaṃ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṃ ativijjha passati.
an4.186:9.11: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī”ti.
an4.186:10.1: “Sādhu, bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṃ uttari pañhaṃ apucchi:
an4.186:10.3: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī”ti?
an4.186:11.2: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṃ paṭibhānaṃ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4.186:11.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī’”ti?
an4.186:11.7: “Idha, bhikkhu, paṇḍito mahāpañño nevattabyābādhāya ceteti na parabyābādhāya ceteti na ubhayabyābādhāya ceteti attahitaparahitaubhayahitasabbalokahitameva cintayamāno cinteti.
an4.186:11.8: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī”ti.
